Method.name: OnPageHEAD
Method.Implementation: Write "<head>" Write !,!,"<title> Поиск товаров </title>",! Write "<script language=""javascript"">" Write !,"sessionid="""_(%session.SessionId)_""";",! Write !,"function fnFindGood(){",! Write "var varabbr=abbr.value;",! Write "var varProperty3609 = Property3609.value;",! Write "var varName = Name.value;",! Write "if((varabbr=="""")&&(varProperty3609=="""")&&(varName=="""")){alert(""Необходимо указать хотя бы один признак по которому следует искать товары."");return}",! Write "goods.loadfrommethod(""Reports.ShowTables.FindGoods"",varabbr,varProperty3609,varName)",! Write "}",! Write !,"</script>" Write !,"</head>"

Method.name: OnPageHTML
Method.Implementation: Write "<html XMLNS:SKLADList>" Write !,"<IMPORT NAMESPACE=""SKLADList"" IMPLEMENTATION=""htc/listview2.htc"">",! Do ..OnPageHEAD() Write !,! Do ..OnPageBODY() Write !,"</html>"
